div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

h2.div: Warren County High teacher attends Georgia School Superintendent Teacher Advisory Council

div.p: Mr. Akella from Warren County High School was nominated to the GA State Superintendent's Teacher Advisory Council, the council is a group of teachers from across the state that meets to discuss how decisions made at the state level are affecting teachers in Georgia's classrooms.
Warren County High School Math teacher Mr. Akella poses for a photo with State Superintendent Richard Woods.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

div.p: Congratulations to Mr. Brown for receiving the Golden Apple Award from WJBF - Channel 12. Golden Apple Award honors hard working teachers who are making a difference everyday in their classroom.

a.strong: Local Educational Agency (LEA)/District Level Parent and Family Engagement Policy

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The purpose of the Warren County School System is to provide the students, parents, faculty, staff and the rest of the Warren County community a center of information to learn about the activities of the school system. The site is composed of many different pages describing the missions of the Warren County School System. This website is used to promote the learning of the schools and the community of Warren County. Documents located on this website are intended exclusively for the use of the faculty and staff of Warren County schools. Your privacy is of prime importance to us. No information will be passed to other parties.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-ibL1re purZT-AhqUyc-ibL1re pSzOP-AhqUyc-ibL1re jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

div.small: Warren County Board of Education Office

small.em: The Warren County School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, age, disability, or sex in its employment practices, student programs and dealings with the public. It is the policy of the Board of Education to comply fully with the requirements of Title VI, Title IX, Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Americans With Disabilities Act and all accompanying regulations.
